Simranpal Kohli is a Data Scientist based in Ireland. He started his career as a web developer for a pharmaceutical client Sanofi & then transitioned into Data analysis, report generation, automation, ML fields & worked for Reliance Industrial Limited.  
He did his masters from Ireland & joined Apple as a Data Analyst. Major task included into data gathering, report generation using Tableau tool, automation of system processes. Currently, he is working as a Data Scientist (AI developer) for an AI based company Afiniti AI Limited in Ireland.
 
 He can adept at leveraging cutting-edge BI tools and preparing data-driven reports as part of providing valuable insights for senior leadership and key business stakeholders. He is Proficient in spearheading & collaborating with high-performing teams to optimize 
processes, complex problem-solving using AI/ML.
